name: Dysfunctional Countryside
description:
*MADE AS A PROJECT FOR CDM 175*

WHAT EVEN IS THIS (at the moment)

A farming simulator text-based game where you interact with animal characters, while exploring what currently exists and planting carrot seeds in hope that you'll survive and live to see another day.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

Follow the prompts on the screen, usually numbers. If a chatbox appears on the bottom of the screen, use SPACE to continue to the next dialogue.

  • Q - Quits the application (Not applicable in web version)
  • R - Resets the game to the title screen

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NOTES

  • As of right now, it is currently unfinished. Will likely work on it later in the future. If you are looking to play this game in its current state, I highly recommend you download it. 
  • Game is meant to be played on a 1080p screen.
  • If you want to play it on the web browser, it works best when the site is zoomed out (Ctrl+Minus on Windows), to about 75%.
  • Pressing Q on the web version causes the game to not function, requires you to refresh the page.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Character designs are my own.

Credit to MewKwota for making the art of the animal characters! Her links are below:

  • Twitter
  • DeviantArt
  • Tumblr
